#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Requirements =
 * ruby
 * ruby additional libs: stomp (with rubygems installed, just do 'gems install stomp'
 * a JMS broker like http:://activemq.apache.org or fuse message broker: in this case you need also Java jdk 1.5. Please check that Stomp support is enabled in conf/activemq.xml (http://activemq.apache.org/stomp.html)
